description: This file defines the AuthStore class, which manages authentication state including token and user information, utilizing shared preferences for persistence in a Flutter application.

classes.name: AuthStore
classes.description: A state management class for handling user authentication data, including token and user info, with methods to load, set, and clear session data.

methods.name: bootstrap
methods.description: Loads authentication data from shared preferences and notifies listeners.

methods.name: setSession
methods.description: Sets the authentication token and user info, persists them, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears authentication data from storage and notifies listeners.
